name: BBQ Bomb Chicken Skewers
description: Be the grill boss of your crew and whip up these bad boys. Drop a flavour bomb on your next BBQ night with chili and paprika in the seasoning and some smokiness in the sauce. Epicure’s prepared BBQ sauce is lower in sodium and sugar than the ones you’ll find on the market, and it has no artificial flavours or colours. And the best part? You'll be chowing down on a delicious combo of protein and veggies. So fire up that grill and let's get cookin'!

ingredients.name: BBQ Chicken & Rib Rub or Buffalo Seasoning

preparation: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Lightly brush with oil.
Chop chicken, peppers, onion, and zucchini into bite-size pieces. In a large bowl, toss chicken and vegetables with rub and oil. Thread onto Grill Boss Skewers.
Grill skewers with lid closed 4–6 min, until lightly charred. Flip skewers and cook 2–3 min. Baste with 1⁄2 the sauce and cook additional 2–3 min, until chicken is cooked through.
Remove from grill; baste skewers with remaining sauce before serving.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup cooked rice or quinoa.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!
